UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Api88 is a novel antibacterial designer peptide to treat systemic infections with multidrug-resistant Gram-negative pathogens.
Literature.Author: Czihal P, Knappe D, Fritsche S, Zahn M, Berthold N, Piantavigna S, Müller U, Van Dorpe S, Herth N, Binas A, Köhler G, De Spiegeleer B, Martin LL, Nolte O, Sträter N, Alber G, Hoffmann R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>256µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 10233(MIC=128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 681(MIC=>256µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 11678(MIC=>256µg/ml)
